contents:
ENOUGH
you do not go on the media to tell people they have darker days coming at their most vulnerable moments
You do not go on the media to make jokes about a traumatic experience that injured hundreds and thousands of people and made them lose their families/homes/friends

My father was 15 years old in 1975. He lived in Ein El Rememneh, Beirut (the capital of the Lebanese Civil War). Its 1990 and the war ended. The war ended? He picked himself up and started his career from scratch. (1/3)

Just got back home, passed by 5 blood banks with a couple of friends, all full with people donating blood, from Tripoli to Antelias.
Lebanese are good people,  they don't deserve this.

If anyone needs a place to stay 
My house in ain el remmeneh is open 
El dawle ma 3am tse3edna w ma elna 8er ba3ed at this point
Will you still love me When I've got nothing but my aching soul?
The blood is on the government’s hands

Don't just to pray for Lebanon.
Lebanese: Go donate blood if you fit the criteria.
Everyone else, please donate.

I feel really powerless 
I want to help in any way possible
I can't donate blood bcz i recently made a tattoo bass if anyone needs a ride in Beirut to any hospital please beje be5edkoun w bredkoun 3al bet just contact me
i didn’t think i would live to see Lebanon turn into a worldwide trend for the most heartbreaking reason
Checking in. Wounded but stable. To all the eds asking if I can work, answer is no
The international community needs to step in and help Lebanon. This is now a case of simple humanity and empathy. #Lebanonexplosion
Does anyone need a home tonight? Contact me
Exhausted.
Beirut’s hospitals are at full capacity.

Seeing the devestation tonight is overwhelming. Praying for families across #Lebanon caring for their loved ones. Thoughts are with the first responders , Red Cross, and medical workers doing all they can to save lives this evening. #BeirutExplosion

Beirut declared a city in a state of emergency. Tomorrow declared a national day of mourning.   Okay. And then? Accountability? And how to compensate for the billions lost when the country is bankrupt already?
Dear AUB community AUBMC is in need of blood from all types If you are close and can donate please proceed to the lab in the medical center

Thanks to all my friends who called me from many countries and from my work clients and suppliers even from Far East countries
 when they ask me why I love all my friends 
 I wish safety to all friends and families and praying for dead’s souls #بيروت #لبنان
The explosion was felt 180 km away- in Cyprus. .... and in Lebanon - Unknown dead. Thousands (more than 2500) wounded. Our only port destroyed.  More than a catastrophe

We're organizing an emergency blood drive.

If you can donate blood, please pm me with your number and area. 

If you need blood, let us know to help find a match.

We're in this together.

2700 tons of ammonium. Who is responsible for their improper storage? And who is responsible for their criminal incompetence? It seems that incompetence and corruption are a weapon of mass destruction. #BeirutExplosion
Minister of Health: around 2500 injured and 30 deaths as of now. Our condolences to their families and our hopes for speedy recoveries

Hey world
Lebanon is not okay
But we, the people, are fine... we have the best medical and rescue teams in the world.
Pray for #beirut
Tweeps here bully tiktokers then get mad when NekatLebanese does the bullying. Make it make sense.

We can't cry anymore
#Lebanon

My heart is broken!
#بيروت

These people currently stable in AUBMC: Olga Feghali, Amar Itani, Joe Chikhani, Liliane Shayto, Zeina Chamoun, Mouhiba Bou Fakhreddine, John (or Joan) Tamer - hope their families see this and are comforted on this terrible night.
People will quit on you. You gotta get up everyday and make sure you never quit on yourself
i love you, Beirut
Our hearts are broken. How much more can we take? How much more can we handle? GO TO IRAN AND FIGHT YOUR WAR FROM THERE. THIS IS NOT YOUR LAND. THIS IS OUR #LEBANON.

Don’t try to lie to us and say it’s a “fireworks” warehouse. Leave us the fuck alone. What more do you want? What more can this country give for a cause that’s not ours and we want nothing to do with! #Lebanon #Beirut
Beirut
Its ok to cry my friends
A part of me doesn’t wanna quit my family again
I am so thankful for the kind messages I received this evening. Thank you all for caring
BREAKING: A ship carrying fireworks caused today's massive Beirut, Lebanon explosion, an official says. There are reportedly 'hundreds' of injuries. #بيروت

My country needs a break from bleeding
 #prayforbeirut
tell your friends you love them

I feel my heart is about to explode
 i can’t sleep
lebanon is surrounded by countries that have attacked & threatened them, tonight they are sleeping in broken homes durring a deadly pandemic, Leb did not deserve that
Tonight we will all sleep in tears.
I am safe but extremely traumatized, thank you to those who were worried and checked in
Grief, heavy heart, held back tears & a deep deep sadness & love for #Beirut that’s breaking all our hearts. Tomorrow if I can do anything to support, I will. Today, I just feel defeated.

Every time we think we have seen it all, another bigger tragedy hits Lebanon. If this is a result of an act of negligence, I hope every “criminal” involved in any way, be it direct or indirect, be prosecuted to the full extent of the law.
#criminals #accountability #lebanon

Guys offre joie فرح العطاء
Aam tekhod aalam aa Kfifen
Li 3ayez beit aw mahal yeb2a please this is their number
Phone Number: 71832439

RETWEET!

It’s was my prom night today, but I couldn’t enjoy it at all I was so worried about everything, and when dad came to pick me up I just start crying, I couldn’t stop thinking about what happened today, that’s so sad and now I can’t sleep, stay strong everyone
I don’t think we will ever recover from this
you lost me at “dr” in your instagram handle

Nitrate is highly flammable; if exposed to any source of flame will explode aggressively producing toxic fumes. Please stay away from the area. The explosion shook us deeply in our hearts. Prayers to our nation. 
#Lebanon
#Beirut 
#لبنان
#بيروت
Sending everyone love. I hope you're all safe, and you can DM if you need any help
I’m here for me and you’re here for you
Can we just live in peace?

I don’t want to see posts “God help #Lebanon” or “candle lit for #Beirut” NO! As much as I am praying for my country, my fury wants to see them hanged!! Be responsible, donate blood and it is time to take back what’s ours!! Enough

URGENT
A 16 year old is about to lose his life.
He desperately needs blood. 

He’s in CMC.

AB- can donate.

Please contact me ASAP if you can
& please rt!!!!

70 313 105
I really can’t sleep knowing many have lost their life and many others are still missing

No words can describe the devastation, sorrow and suffering Lebanon is going through after #Beirut #explosion. Lebanon was already struggling politically, economically, and with COVID-19 surging again. #MentalHealth needs are going to be paramount and as important as basic needs!
Guys, if you have a house in jnoub or bel shmel, then I really recommend that you go there for now. The atmosphere on Beirut is very toxic, and may cause serious problems.
My loved ones and I are safe from the explosion in Beirut. But many people have had their lives change forever. I don’t know how much more this country can take.

My friends around Beirut, don’t hesitate to dm me if you need ANY thing!
Allah ykoun maakon
Guys any therapist can tell us how to deal with such trauma with kids? My nephews are terrified. What should we expect and how to deal with it.

Can we go back to the way things were just for a day?
I miss n o r m a l.
Liking my message is not a Response!
Those rich celebrities should donate some of their money instead of praying on inatagram

Tonight we mourn Beirut
Tonight we mourn our city 
We mourn our families
Friends
Colleagues 

Tears of acid 
Burning capillaries 
Our hearts cannot take it

Smoke of blood 
Burning lungs 
Our chests cannot take it

We could be numb to it all
We could adapt to it all 
But not this

Your ruler does not care about you. Your ruler cares about his agenda & his money.

Read that again. Let it sink in.
I wont comment on anything except I just came from hospital my daughter was Injured. 7 stitches Tha is God
My tweeps. If any of you has no roof over his / her head tonight, we have 2 bedrooms in our house in Dbayeh waiting for you.
PRAY FOR LEBANON

We do not need prayers anymore, we need actions!

We’ve prayed for too long, if we do not help ourselves, God will not help us.

#EnoughIsEnough
Are you not able to sleep too?
I really hope all of you are okay and doing good and if u need help may it be materliastic or emotional please my dms are open.

For anyone affected by today’s explosion, I am ready to support as much as I can to help you recover from the damages faced. Plus I live Matn area and my house is open for those in need for a place to stay.
#YouAreNotAlone 
#انفجار_بيروت

How does one sleep after what we experienced today? This is all so surreal. Grateful that I’m fine, and my friends & family are all fine. Emotions are mixed between absorbing what happened, and so much anger toward everyone who’s been in power the past 45 years.
As a Lebanese citizen, I declare being 100% unsafe in Lebanon, and ask any International Force / Community to govern this country.

Can we at least respect the victims and not share videos or pictures of them.
Also can news stations stop filiming people who are injured, bleeding or in critical condition. This is not the time to ask them questions or what they saw or heard.
Thank you

So far early reports talk of a fireworks shipment explosion. Not very convincing. There was a small earthquake-like "shake" and heavy smoke in the port pier before the (second?) massive explosion. All scenarios are open.

#Beirut #beirut_explosion #lebanon24 #lebanon
I'm safe, like this if you are too?

Years after 9/11 did we dare to assume the « inside job » status of the operation. I don’t exclude the Beirut port explosion being also an « inside job » by a party that feels threatened about their status in the region.
Hope you never witness such moments. I'm traumatised still trying to remember what happened!

I have never seen in all my professional life what I saw tonight in all the hospital wards!
Catastrophic is not enough to describe the status!
This is too much for anyone to take!
This country feels apocalyptic.
This is too much.. it’s just too much.. what have we, Lebanese, done to deserve this.. it’s heartbreaking
Anyone around dahye/Jamous and has a samsung s71 charger? I left Gemmayze barefoot, was no time left to take my stuff.
had a 15 minute conversation with the full moon last night while @dulcelavandula watched thinking i was losing my mind.

#Beirut is a devastated city 
 #بيروت

Gotta say I'm blessed today!
I left University at 5:40 while my exam ended at 6 ! I heard the sound of the explosion after 30 min  ! Thanking God for today and I'm sorry for the loss of each and everyone of you.
Eza fi hayala chi be2der se3do I'm ready !!

How can I donate money to the health sector now that #COVID19 is at its ultimate peak? It's time to bring that energy back! Doctors, nurses, cleaners and all health sector workers needs us. Who's starting the campaign?
they destroyed our homes, our city, our youths :(

Sabah l kheir
we3yin rey2in 3an gher 3ade

I just can’t sleep in peace while others lost their homes, families or lives.
That’s for me, what about you you mother fuckers politicans ?
I feel so helpless what can we do
Yaret ma khle2et hon
Haven’t been much on twitter lately, so who/what is seth rogan?

Would like to thank the amazing tweeps who reached out in whatever ways possible to check on me. 

Love you guys.
